plugins.name: Bureau Works
plugins.description:
With Bureau Works, you can translate and localize your Figma files, along with over 40 other file types, using a platform that leverages LLM for enhanced context in your translations.


You have the option to use just our Figma integration or unlock the full power of our Translation Management System.


Our context-first translation platform allows:

  1. Designers,
  2. Marketers,
  3. Agencies,
  4. Localization managers,
  5. Translators,
  6. Developers


To efficiently translate, contextualize, and scale global experiences, all with the support of enterprise-grade hosting and security.


Trusted by global leaders like Harley-Davidson, Scaled Agile, Automation Anywhere, Uber, and Zendesk.


Why Bureau Works?


  1. Beyond translation memories and glossaries: Optimize SEO with the best terms in multiple languages.
  2. Automate translation workflows: Streamline processes to improve efficiency.
  3. Knowledge management: Centralize your content knowledge for better access.
  4. Advanced permissions: Customize access and roles for different team members.
  5. Quality control: Monitor and ensure translation quality with clear indicators, for all content types—from software and Figma to video and eLearning.


Bureau Works empowers over 20,000 users worldwide to stay ahead of the AI translation game.


How to Set Up


To get started, you'll need a Bureau Works account, please signup here


Follow our Integration tutorial here.


Or send a message to our support team here.


Thank you very much for considering our translation platform. Please, dont hesitate to reach out to us through any of the channels above.

plugins.name: Вотермарки MR7
plugins.description:
Этот плагин работает только внутри одноименного дизайн-файла.


Здесь вы можете без боли ставить водяные метки на фото - просто перетащите на канву набор фотографий с компьютера, запустите плагин, выберите опции для расположения логотипа и нажмите "Добавить метки". Как только изображения появятся на экране, нажмите Export в правой панели, выберите 1x PNG, затем Export layers.


Для тех, кто случайно попал сюда:


Этот плагин был разработан для петербургского СМИ и не адаптировался для универсального использования.


Если ваш сценарий использования подходит под этот плагин, вы можете его использовать со своими логотипами. Для этого вам нужно:


  1. Перейти в дизайн-файл по ссылке выше
  2. Разблокировать слой под названием mr7 в секции "Логотип"
  3. Заменить содержимое компонент на свой логотип (желательно в векторном формате) - доступно для использования две версии: в данном случае используются обычная и темная, но можно ставить любые
  4. Запустить плагин и притвориться, что логотипы в интерфейсе соответствуют вашим


Формат изображения "Галерея" масштабирует фото до 2160*1440px, а формат "Обложка" - до 2560*1440px. Нет, пока размер поменять нельзя - он указан в коде. Я планирую адаптировать плагин для универсального использования в будущих версиях.


Если у вас есть вопросы или вы хотите что-то похожее, напишите мне на m.a.zamyatin@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: Ставим плашечки без боли и мучений

plugins.name: Stellar - Streamline Your Design Handoff
plugins.description:
Stellar 🚀 empowers you to create organized and professional documentation for your design handoff. With four robust tools, you can structure your Figma files in a clean and intuitive manner.


Frame Identifier - Ideal for pinpointing specific screens or components.

Easily create clear headers to identify individual frames:

  1. Select any frame or group of elements.
  2. Add a title and subtitle.
  3. A polished header will be generated above your selection, enhancing clarity and organization.


Section Identifier - Perfect for grouping features or user flows.

Organize related frames with cohesive section headers:

  1. Select multiple frames that belong together.
  2. Add a section title and description.
  3. A header will be created that spans across all selected frames, providing a unified view.


Flow Identifier - Essential for tracking progress and communicating state.

Document your navigation flows with intuitive status indicators:

  1. Select frames within your user flow.
  2. Add a title and description.
  3. Choose a status (e.g., In Progress, Ready for Development).
  4. Status tags are color-coded and include helpful icons, making it easy to convey the current state.



Connector Arrows - Connect your frames with intelligent arrows.

Seamlessly link frames with dynamic arrows:

  1. Select two or more frames to connect.
  2. Choose from 4 arrow styles: Default Arrow (clean and simple), Success Arrow (positive flows), Error Arrow (error states), Dashed Arrow (alternative paths).
  3. Toggle between light and dark modes for optimal visibility.
  4. Arrows automatically adjust to frame positions, ensuring a tidy and logical layout.


Perfect for:

  1. Design Systems
  2. User Flow Documentation
  3. Development Handoff
  4. Project Status Tracking
  5. Team Collaboration



Start organizing your Figma files with Stellar and create documentation that both designers and developers will appreciate! 🚀🚀🚀
plugins.tagline: Streamline your design handoff with organized headers, sections, and smart connectors

plugins.name: Figma to Storyteq
plugins.description:
Turn your Figma designs into Storyteq dynamic editable ads.


The Figma to Storyteq Plugin enables designers to effortlessly export their Figma designs into Storyteq, turning static visuals into dynamic and customizable ad templates.


Streamline your workflow and scale content production with ease.


  1. Efficient Export – Quickly send your Figma designs to Storyteq in just a few clicks.
  2. Dynamic Template Creation – Convert static designs into adaptable templates ready for automation with Storyteq’s Ad Engine.
  3. User-Friendly Interface – Intuitive, seamless integration between Figma and Storyteq.


How It Works


  1. Design in Figma – Create your visuals as usual.
  2. Export via Plugin – Use the Figma to Storyteq Plugin to send Figma designs to Storyteq.
  3. Customize in Storyteq – Modify and manage your dynamic templates for automated content creation.


Use Cases


  1. Marketing Campaigns – Develop adaptable templates for various assets.
  2. Brand Consistency – Ensure design uniformity across platforms.
  3. Rapid Prototyping – Quickly generate dynamic versions of design concepts.



Getting Started


To begin transforming your static designs into dynamic ad templates, download the Figma to Storyteq Plugin today. This tool is exclusively available for users with an active Storyteq license. Follow these simple steps to integrate your designs with Storyteq:


  1. Sign up for Storyteq if you haven't already.
  2. Run the Storyteq Plugin within Figma.
  3. Authenticate your Storyteq account by logging in.
  4. Follow the plugin’s steps to export and customize your designs.


About


Storyteq helps global brands deliver content faster with the power of automation. Bring teams together to create pixel-perfect campaigns on brand, on time and on budget across markets and channels.


✔ Save Time – Reduce manual work and speed up content production.


✔ Ensure Consistency – Maintain brand integrity across multiple variations.


✔ Scale Easily – Automate and update templates effortlessly in Storyteq.
plugins.tagline: Turn your Figma designs into dynamic editable ads in Storyteq.

plugins.name: Frameverse
plugins.description:
Frameverse - Share Frames Seamlessly


Frameverse is a powerful Figma plugin that revolutionizes design sharing. Generate secure tokens for your frames and assets, allowing instant access across teams and continents. Share specific design elements without exposing your entire file, maintaining control while enabling seamless collaboration.



✨ Key Features


- One-Click Sharing: Select any frame, section, or slice and generate a shareable token instantly

- Smart Import: Paste a token to import frames with perfect fidelity, maintaining all properties including:

- Layout structures and constraints

- Shapes and component instances

- Vector paths and effects

- Fonts and text styles

- Images and fills


- Batch Operations: Share or import multiple frames at once

- Preview Panel: Visual preview of selected frames before sharing



🎯 Perfect For


- Design System Teams sharing component updates

- Agencies sharing design patterns with clients

- Product Teams maintaining consistent layouts across files

- Anyone looking to transfer frames between files without manual recreation



💡 How It Works


1. Select the frames you want to share

2. Click "Generate Token" to create a unique share code

3. Share the token with your team

4. Recipients paste the token to import frames with all properties intact (Eg: YJS-hoo)



🔒 Security & Performance


- Tokens are temporary and expire after 24 hours

- No data persistence - files are fully purged after token expiration

- Share specific frames without exposing entire files

- Intelligent compression and processing for optimal performance

- Progressive loading for larger frames



No account required. Start sharing frames in seconds!



Questions or feedback? Contact us
plugins.tagline: Exchange assets with the most intuitive frame sharing solution for Figma

plugins.name: RNDR: Braze -> FigJam Automation
plugins.description:
🔎 RNDR by For Now Marketing


Automate your Braze-to-FigJam visualization.


RNDR makes it effortless to visualize your Braze Messages directly in FigJam — so your marketing, design, and ops teams can stay aligned without copy-pasting a thing.


⚡ What RNDR can do:

  1. Automatically sync Campaign + Canvas data from Braze into FigJam
  2. Display key details for all messaging channels
  3. View raw HTML + rendered screenshots of all your emails — side by side
  4. Filter by tags you’ve already set in Braze
  5. Visualize everything, all in one place


🆕 New: Email Screenshot Support

No more guessing how your emails look. Instantly see both the raw and fully rendered HTML for every email in your Braze dashboard — embedded right in FigJam.


💬 Get Involved

We’re building fast and would love your feedback!

plugins.name: Tazym
plugins.description:
Introducing Tazym, the ultimate Figma plugin that streamlines the design-to-web process. With Tazym, you can effortlessly upload your designs to the cloud, generating a unique URL that allows you to update your design in Figma in real-time. Say goodbye to manual website updates or the need to rely on developers. With Tazym, you are the creator, and you own your designs.


Getting started with Tazym is easy. Simply select your design, name it, choose a format (SVG, PNG, or JPG), and voila - you have a URL that can be used anywhere to showcase your work. When inspiration strikes and you want to make updates, it's as easy as editing in Figma and hitting the Update button in Tazym. Your users will see your latest creations instantly.


Ready to take control of your designs and streamline your workflow? Visit tazym.com to learn more and start using Tazym today!
plugins.tagline: Export your Figma designs to URLs. Edit them any time.

plugins.name: Nalipka
plugins.description:
Nalipka is a simple and playful plugin designed to quickly turn any element into a sticker.

Perfect for brainstorms, workshops, notes, visual highlights — or just for fun.


How it works:


  1. Select one or more elements
  2. Open the Nalipka plugin
  3. Click the Create Sticker button
  4. The selected elements will:
  5. Get a white stroke
  6. Soft shadow
  7. 2px rounded corners
  8. Text will be auto-flattened to vector


Key features:


✦ Supports multiple selected objects


✦ Automatically converts text to vector


✦ Preserves original position


✦ Adds white stroke, shadow, and rounded corners — like a real sticker


✦ Clean and minimal UI
plugins.tagline: Make anything look like a sticker. Select → Click → Done.

plugins.name: Dummy Details Filler
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that helps you populate your designs with dummy data. Unlike other data generators, this plugin gives you precise control over your generated content through customizable options for each data type. This is perfect for mockups, prototypes, and design presentations.


Data Types:

  1. Generate various types of realistic data:
  2. Full Names (International names from different cultures)
  3. Usernames (Customizable patterns)
  4. Email Addresses (Custom domains and formats)
  5. Phone Numbers (US, UK, France, Germany, Sri Lanka formats)
  6. Physical Addresses
  7. Company Names
  8. Job Titles
  9. Dates (Short, Long, ISO, European formats)
  10. Numbers (Custom ranges)
  11. Lorem Ipsum (Custom length)
  12. Passwords (Adjustable length and complexity)
  13. File Names (Various types and extensions)
  14. Domain Names
  15. IP Addresses
  16. Color Codes (HEX, RGB, HSL)
  17. Zip/Postal Codes (US, UK, Canada formats)
  18. Cities (Global selection)
  19. Countries
  20. UUID
  21. Prices (Multiple currencies and formats)
  22. Account Numbers
  23. Currency Symbols & Codes
  24. URL-friendly Slugs


Each data type comes with its own set of customization options, allowing you to generate exactly the kind of data you need for your designs. Whether you're creating a simple contact list or a complex dashboard, Dummy Details Filler helps you create more realistic and meaningful mockups quickly and efficiently.


Made with ❤️ by Yasir Ahamad
plugins.tagline: Fill your designs with dummy data instantly with more control!

plugins.description:
With Mirror Signage's Figma plugin, updating your connected screens content is a breeze! Just choose your design in Figma, pick your playlist, hit 'Export,' and voilà – your screens will automatically update with the new design.


Need to update menus or any other info? Simply export the design you’ve already worked on, and it’ll refresh the content on your screen in no time.


Take full advantage of Figma's power and its awesome plugins to create anything you need – from menus and info screens to dashboards.


Start a free trial today – no credit card required!

plugins.name: Recent frames
plugins.description:
Work faster by quickly navigating back to the frames you recently worked on. The plugin displays a small window with a history of Figma frames you clicked. You can use the back button to quickly go to your last frames. Only top-level frames are listed; nested frames are ignored.


Features:

  1. Back button to quickly navigate to a previously selected frame.
  2. List of recent frames: a single click centers the frame in your view, while a double-click auto-fits the zoom.
  3. Light and dark mode with native Figma UI style.
  4. Menu with special actions: quickly jump to the selected node in your local main component or select the same child node in all component instances.


Why I Created It:

I built this plugin because I work on complex Figma prototypes. I often need to copy something from a distant frame and then jump back to where I was working. I sometimes forget where I was in the project. I wanted a simple way to undo and return to my previous spot without any hassle.


Use Cases:

  1. Effortlessly undo your navigation by returning to the last frame you clicked.
  2. Quickly jump between components and your working frames.
  3. Present your design flows without manual panning and zooming.
plugins.tagline: Instantly jump to your last frames with a back button

plugins.name: Consistify
plugins.description:
With the Consistify plugin, you can be be able to:


Detect Design Inconsistencies: Scan multiple frames for discrepancies in font styles, colors, buttons, iconography(coming soon), spacing, and navigation elements(coming soon) etc.


Get Visual Feedback: Receive clear, color-coded tags indicating inconsistencies, with direct frame references and numerical comparisons for easy analysis.


Streamline Workflow(coming soon): Highlight design issues directly in the UI, allowing users to click and focus on problematic frames, helping maintain design system integrity across projects.


To use the Consistify plugin, follow these steps:


Open your design in Figma.

Select at least 2 frames you want to compare for inconsistencies.

Run the Plugin


Advanced Features(coming son:


Accessibility Checker: Analyze contrast ratios in real-time for WCAG compliance.

Component Management: Identify duplicate components and track usage statistics.


Design System Health Monitoring: Flag inconsistent color usage, manual overrides on text styles, and mismatched font sizes.


The plugin is a must-have tool for ensuring cohesive, well-structured designs while saving time on manual checks.

accepted.name: Nyekachi Wihioka
accepted.description: Product Designer passionate about creating seamless, user-centered experiences. Building tools that empower designers to work smarter and faster.

plugins.tagline: Streamline design workflows by detecting inconsistencies and ensuring design system integrity.

plugins.name: Populate JSON data
plugins.description:
✨ JSON-to-Design Plugin

🚀 Supercharge Your Design Workflow


Bring your templates to life with data-driven automation! The JSON-to-Design Plugin allows you to effortlessly populate and duplicate designs using simple JSON files.


Key Features


✅ Upload JSON Files

Supports two formats:


  1. Array format: Automatically duplicates selected designs for each object in the array while replacing placeholders like {{name}} and {{surname}}.


{
"array": [
{ "name": "John", "surname": "Doe" },
{ "name": "Emma", "surname": "Walker" },
{ "name": "Liam", "surname": "Harris" }
]
}


  1. Object format: Updates a single design with JSON values without duplication.


{
"name": "John",
"surname": "Doe"
}


✅ Dynamic Placeholder Replacement

Replace {{name}}, {{surname}}, or other placeholders in text elements with real data—seamlessly integrate information into your designs.


✅ Save Time and Effort

Eliminate repetitive manual tasks by automating data entry and duplication. Perfect for projects requiring consistent layouts with unique data sets.


How to Use

🎯 Follow these simple steps to get started:


Upload Your JSON File

Upload a correctly formatted JSON file using the plugin. Choose between the array format or object format depending on your use case.

Select the Layer

Highlight the Figma layer containing text objects with placeholders like {{name}} and {{surname}}. Ensure these placeholders are named correctly.

Click “Populate Design”

Let the plugin work its magic! It will duplicate designs or populate data based on your JSON file.


💡 Tip: Double-check placeholder names in your design to match JSON keys for smooth operation.


Why Choose JSON-to-Design?


💡 Smart Automation: Unlike other plugins, this tool simplifies both duplication and data replacement in one intuitive flow.

⏱ Time-Saving Magic: Whether you’re working with a few data points or hundreds, let the plugin handle the heavy lifting while you focus on creativity.
plugins.tagline: The plugin allows you to upload a JSON file and, based on it, populate designs with this data.

plugins.name: Companion
plugins.description:
Advanced Color Finder [PRO Feature]

A powerful tool that allows you to search for colors across your files.

  1. Ultra-fast search algorithm with advanced labeling
  2. Colors are grouped by type (variable or style) and by source (Remote or local libraries)
  3. Ability to search by variable name, color hex and by layer name
  4. Display number of matching results per color
  5. Select all or individual layers that matches the selected color


Style Guide Generator [Free]

  1. Transform your color collections into a beautiful style guide
  2. Choose one or more color formats to display (HEX, RGB, HSL)
  3. Support for cross-collections linked variables


Contrast Checker [Free]

  1. Check for AA and AAA level compliance
  2. Interactive and instant results when adjusting colors
  3. Live preview and swap foreground and background colors
  4. Get results for for text (Small / Large) and graphics elements


Tints & Shades Generator [Free]

  1. Interactive generator with live colors preview
  2. Ability to customize the number of generated colors
  3. Built-in contrast checker
  4. Preview generated colors on canvas
  5. Save generated colors to variables


Color Converter [Free]

  1. Convert any given color to popular color formats
  2. Currently supports HEX, RGB, HSL, CMYK, HSV, OKLCH and LAB
  3. Select and copy results


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


Sort Layers [Free]

A set of different ways to sort your layers within Figma.

  1. Alphabetical sorting (A-Z or Z-A)
  2. Sort by X or Y position on the canvas
  3. Sort by layer type (Frame, text, group, section, etc…)
  4. Reverse current sorting
  5. Magically sort everything based on names and positions


Distribute Layers [Free]

A powered up version of Figma’s built-in distribute feature.

  1. Distribute selected layers horizontally or vertically
  2. Set a desired value for the space between layers
  3. Ability to align layers from top (in horizontal mode) or left (in vertical mode)


Display As Grid [Free]

Quickly rearrange selected layers in a grid layout with improved alignment and sorting features

  1. Ability to choose the number of columns along with vertical and horizontal gaps
  2. Ability to align columns vertically or not
  3. Extra sorting capabilities for better organization


Hidden Layers [PRO Feature]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage hidden layers. It allows you to

  1. Hide selected layers
  2. Show all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  3. Select all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  4. Delete all hidden layers within a page or within a selection


Locked Layers [Free]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage locked layers. It allows you to

  1. Lock or unlock selected layers
  2. Lock or unlock all layers on a page


Remove Numbers [PRO Feature]

Get rid of all those annoying numbers that Figma automatically generates. A single click gets the job done


Ungroup Single Layers Group [PRO Feature]

Optimize your files by ungrouping single layers group or deleting empty groups


Start at 0, 0 [PRO Feature]

It’s just the cherry on top. A file is never tidy unless you start at 0, 0 — and for that, we got you covered


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


Deep Search [PRO Feature]

Deep Search is a unique and ultra-fast way to find any layer within your file, in a simple yet powerful search tool. The search algorithm has been thoroughly optimized for speed, especially for large files.


Below is how it works:

  1. Start by selecting the layer type (Frame, text, rectangle, etc.) or choose “All Layers” to search everything
  2. Choose one or more properties to search for (Fill color, width, font, opacity and many many more). You can also use the Quick Search box to search for any property from the list for easier access
  3. Hit the search button and voilà. Results are there.
  4. Browse the list of matching search results, with ability to filter by layer name.
  5. Click on a result to view it on the canvas or click “Select All” to bulk select all matching results


Here are some example scenarios:

  1. [Simple] ― Find all text layers with the font “Inter” and font weight “Semi Bold”
  2. [Simple] ― Find all rectangles with a corner radius of 16 and corner smoothing of 60%
  3. [Medium] ― Find all instances of a component named “Button” that are hidden and have been detached
  4. [Medium] ― Find all auto layouts that have a minimum width of at least 393px
  5. [Advanced] ― Find all instances of an external library component named “Input” that are marked as ready for dev and whose top left corner radius is less than or equal to 20px
  6. [Advanced] ― Find all layers that have a hidden stroke, have a blend mode applied and whose name include the characters “es”


In short, the possibilities are endless


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


MagiConnect [PRO Feature]

MagiConnect is a simple and easy to use tool that allows you to draw connectors between your frames


Here are some key features:

  1. Auto-draw mode: When enabled, it allows you to quickly draw connectors between any two elements you select on the canvas. The direction of the connector arrow is based on the selection order
  2. Manual mode was designed to give you more flexibility in accessing nested layers before drawing a connector. It’s slower for sure, but gives you more control
  3. You can customize the connector by adjusting the color, opacity, stroke width, radius and stroke style
  4. If you’re not happy with the connector customizations, you can always reset all values to their default state from the manage menu
  5. You can also add an optional description to annotate the connector
  6. The tool will always remember your last used settings whenever it’s launched the next time.
  7. You can update specific connectors within a selection or update globally across a page
  8. In cases where a fresh start is the way to go, simple go to “Manage” and select “Remove all connectors”. This will delete all connectors you’ve added on this page


―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――


When you purchase the license, you will get a lifetime unlimited access to the plugin, and all to the upcoming features that i’m planning to add. Some really exciting features are coming soon. This is truly the beginning.


Due to limitations from Figma, you can only access PRO features from the account you purchased the license on. You will not be able to access PRO features from connected accounts and must purchase the license again if you want to use it on another account.


Future releases of the plugin might not be at the current price tag.


If you made it this far, I salute you for your patience.


For any questions, ideas, bugs or complaints, I would love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out.


Built with ❤️
plugins.tagline: The all-in-one plugin you never knew you needed

plugins.name: EasyMemo
plugins.description:
EasyMemo is a versatile plugin for creating, editing, and managing text memos within Figma. With EasyMemo, you can easily add colorful sticky notes, shapes with text, and simple text nodes to your canvas, helping to keep your workspace organized.


Key Features:


Memo Creation and Editing: Simply enter your text, select your desired memo type, and create memos effortlessly. You can edit memos directly on the canvas, and updates are reflected in real-time.

Customizable Colors: Choose colors from a preset color palette, allowing you to categorize and prioritize memos. The text color automatically adjusts for optimal readability based on the selected background color.

Easy Management:


Organize Memos in a List: Add memos to a list for better organization. You can update or delete memo texts directly from the list. The list is scrollable and always up-to-date.

Batch Generation: Easily generate all listed memos at once. Just click the "Create Shapes" button, and all memos will be neatly arranged on the canvas.

Efficient Layout: Memos are generated in the center of the viewport, focusing on the most relevant areas. They are neatly arranged to avoid overlap.

User-Friendly Interface: The modern and intuitive design features a clearly laid-out text input area, radio buttons for selecting memo types, a color palette, and a dynamically updating list.

How to Use:


Enter Text: Input your memo content in the text input area.

Select Memo Type: Choose from shapes with text, simple text, or sticky notes using the radio buttons.

Pick a Color: Select a color from the palette to categorize your memos. The selected color applies to the memo background, and the text color adjusts automatically.

Add to List: Press the Enter key to add the memo to the list. You can edit or delete memos directly within the list.

Generate Memos: Click the "Create Shapes" button to generate all memos on the canvas at once. Memos are centered in the viewport and neatly arranged.

EasyMemo is the perfect tool for organizing ideas and feedback within your Figma projects. Whether brainstorming, planning, or collaborating, EasyMemo simplifies memo management and supports you efficiently.
plugins.tagline: メモやテキストをEnterキー押下のみでリスト化して一括でShape,テキスト、Stickyを生成するプラグインです

plugins.name: Selemander Edit
plugins.description:
This plug-in provides useful functions such as reordering multi-selected items, enlarging and shrinking selections, automatically selecting items by name, deleting, and flipping the order.

이 플러그인은 선택한 여러 항목의 순서 변경, 선택 확대 및 축소, 이름을 통한 항목 자동 선택, 삭제, 순서 뒤집기 등 유용한 기능을 제공합니다.


### Short cut (If the plug-in window is enabled) ###

### 단축키 (플러그인 포커스 상태에서 동작) ###

  1. [Shift + Enter]: Enter the entered text into the selected text items. / 입력된 텍스트로 선택된 텍스트 항목에 입력
  2. [.] : Select the next item / 다음 항목 선택
  3. [,] : Select previous item / 이전 항목 선택
  4. [Shift + .]: Expand your selection to the previous item / 이전 항목을 선택에 추가합니다.
  5. [Shift + ,]: Expand your selection to the next item / 다음 항목을 선택에 추가합니다.
  6. [Left Arrow ←] : Move the selected items to the left / 선택된 항목들을 이전으로 이동
  7. [Right Arrow →] : Move the selected items to the right / 선택된 항목들을 다음으로 이동
  8. [Home] : Move to First / 첫번째 항목 선택
  9. [End] : Move to Last / 마지막 항목 선택
  10. [Delete, Backspace] : Delete selected items / 선택 항목들 삭제
  11. [Shift + s] : Swap between two texts / 선택된 두 텍스트 항목의 내용 바꾸기
  12. [Shift + r] : Reverse the selected items / 선택 항목의 순서를 뒤집기
  13. [-] : Unselect the last of the selections / 선택 항목들 중 마지막 항목을 선택 제거
  14. [Shift + -] : Unselect the first of the selections / 선택 항목들 중 첫번째 항목을 선택 제거
  15. [Shift + 1] : Select odd number items / 홀수 항목을 선택
  16. [Shift + 2] : Select even number items / 짝수 항목을 선택
plugins.tagline: Multi Selection & text controler for autolayout

plugins.name: Ungroup with BG
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to ungroup frames while preserving their background colors, corner radius, and strokes. When you ungroup a frame that has background styles, the plugin automatically creates a rectangle with the same styles at the same layer position.


Features:

• Preserves background colors and opacity

• Maintains corner radius settings

• Keeps stroke styles

• Retains the original layer position

• Automatically selects the new background and ungrouped elements


背景色やストロークが設定されたフレームをグループ解除する際に、それらのスタイルを保持するプラグインです。背景スタイルを持つフレームをグループ解除すると、自動的に同じスタイルの四角形が同じレイヤー位置に作成されます。


機能：

• 背景色と不透明度を保持

• 角丸の設定を維持

• ストロークスタイルを保持

• 元のレイヤー位置を維持

• 新しい背景と解除された要素を自動選択
plugins.tagline: Ungroup frames while preserving their background styles

plugins.name: Lighthouse
plugins.description:
Lighthouse helps designers check Lottie animation compatibility across iOS, Android, and Web. It scans Figma frames, detects unsupported features like shadows, blurs, etc., and lists issues directly on affected layers. Double-click to jump to problem layers and get instant updates as you fix them—ensuring a smooth animation workflow.


How to Use Lighthouse:

1️⃣ Select a Frame – Open Lighthouse and choose a frame to analyze.

2️⃣ Instant Issue Detection – View a list of unsupported animation features.

3️⃣ Quick Fix Navigation – Double-click an issue to select the affected layer.

4️⃣ Live Updates – Changes update instantly as you fix issues.

5️⃣ Final Check & Export – Ensure compatibility for seamless Lottie animations.

6️⃣ Mark frames – Mark frames that are ready for animation to avoid confusion and ensure efficient workflow.


Simplify your motion design process with Lighthouse! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Instantly detect unsupported Lottie features in Figma for seamless cross-platform animations.

plugins.name: Class Action
plugins.description:
Class Action is a powerful CSS-like styling tool that revolutionizes how designers work with consistent design tokens and variables in Figma. Create Tailwind-inspired class libraries, UI kits, and design templates with ease, then apply saved styles instantly to other frames with a single click.


Key features:

  1. Create and manage reusable style classes similar to CSS and Tailwind classes
  2. Build and apply complete UI kits and design templates across multiple frames
  3. Preserve Figma variables, color tokens, and style references in your templates
  4. Full support for Tailwind-like utility classes, component styles, and design tokens
  5. Premium version with unlimited style classes and advanced template management


Class Action brings CSS and Tailwind-inspired workflows to Figma by eliminating repetitive styling tasks. Perfect for design systems, UI kit creation, template libraries, and maintaining visual consistency across projects. Save time, reduce styling errors, and keep your designs perfectly aligned with your component library or Tailwind-like system.


Compatible with both light and dark Figma themes, supports variable tokens for responsive templates, and optimized for performance even in large UI kit files with complex component libraries.
plugins.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

136903.release_notes:
This update introduces powerful new control features and interface improvements that provide more precise management over how styles are applied to your Figma elements. The plugin now offers granular property selection and enhanced user experience consistency throughout the interface.

New in this release:
• Selective Property Application System: Choose exactly which properties to apply from saved classes with granular category control (Dimensions, Layout, Appearance, Fills, Strokes, Effects, Variables, Grids, Position)
• Persistent Property Preferences: Class-specific scope settings are remembered and indicated with visual markers for streamlined workflows
• Enhanced CSS Property Display: ClassDetails modal now shows only valid CSS properties, filtering out Figma-specific attributes for cleaner code reference
• Standardized Interface Components: Unified text styling across all modal dialogs for improved visual consistency
• Updated Promotional Pricing: Summer special offer with 50% discount (€4.50/year instead of €9/year) using code Y0NTY0NA
• Improved Import/Export Compatibility: Enhanced data format support ensures seamless class sharing across different plugin versions

These enhancements provide more control over style application while maintaining the plugin's focus on efficiency and precision. The selective application system addresses user requests for more granular control without compromising the streamlined workflow that makes Class Action effective for rapid Figma design iterations.
136903.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

plugins.description:
PixelTweak is a simple yet powerful tool that helps you achieve pixel-perfect design. It smooths edges, rounds numbers, and aligns elements with just one click.


  1. Select your layers – Choose the layer or layers you want to perfect
  2. Hit the Tweak button – One click is all it takes to activate the magic!

plugins.name: PropSelect
plugins.description:
PropSelect enhances your Figma workflow by allowing you to copy and paste specific properties like fill, stroke, and corner radius between elements without overwriting all properties.


Here is a YouTube video summarizing the features and working of this plugin - https://youtu.be/76v9z9xthH0


How it works:

1. Select an element: Click on an element in your design, and its properties will appear in the plugin UI.

2. Choose properties to copy: For each property (e.g., fill, stroke, corner radius), you can select a checkbox to indicate which properties you want to copy. Once you're done, click the copy button to save the selected properties.

3. Paste properties: You can paste the copied properties onto one or more elements at once.


Features:

• Selective property copying: Choose exactly which properties to copy (e.g., fill, stroke, corner radius) to avoid overwriting unwanted styles.

• Multi-object pasting: Apply copied properties to multiple objects simultaneously, saving time when working with multiple elements.

• Compatibility with other methods: You can paste properties copied outside of the plugin directly. Copying properties within plugin will not override that.

• Undo support: Easily undo your last action if something goes wrong.


Tips:

• Use PropSelect to quickly replicate specific properties across multiple objects without affecting other styles.

• Perfect for maintaining consistency in your design while only changing the properties you care about.

• Works well for batch edits where you want to adjust specific properties, like color or stroke width, across many elements.


Known issues:

• Does not copy underline properties or text alignment.

• Will not work on text boxes with different properties applied to individual contents.
plugins.tagline: Copy and paste specific properties of an element

plugins.name: BulkGen
plugins.description:
BulkGen figma plugin saves you hundreds of hours of doing grunt work. If you're tasked with creating the same design, lots of time with just some data changing — don't wast time doing it manually. Just use bulkgen, it can auto populate your figma designs from a Google Sheet.


Features:

  1. Google Sheet Import: Make sure these are set to public.
  2. CSV Import: Works for local files


How it Works:

  1. Paste your Google Sheets URL
  2. Make sure the dynamic layers in Figma are labelled correctly (ex: firstname would be #firstname)
  3. Select a base template and hit generate, it's that easy.


Use Cases:

  1. Event Banners: Doing the same event in many cities? This will work for that
  2. Certificates: Automate 1000s of certificates in just a few clicks
  3. Wedding Invites: Mail Merge is so oldschool, just use this.
  4. And Many More.


Website: https://bulkgen.app

Help docs: https://ybnco.notion.site/BulkGen-Help-Docs-1905dc1b35f980f0becbe647dfae68d4

Email me: yb@yashbhardwaj.com
plugins.tagline: Generate Figma Designs From Google Sheets/CSV

plugins.name: get-antd-token
plugins.description:
# get-antd-token - Ant Design Token 匹配工具


## 简介


get-antd-token 是一个专为设计师和开发者打造的 Figma 插件，帮助您快速匹配 Figma 设计元素与 Ant Design 的设计 Token，实现无缝的设计与开发协作。


## 主要功能


- 🎨 **精准颜色匹配**：选择任意元素，即时获取对应的 Ant Design 颜色 Token

- 💧 **半透明颜色识别**：智能识别半透明颜色，并提供 `rgba(token.colorXXX, 0.x)` 格式的替代方案

- 🔍 **边框与内边距识别**：自动检测元素的圆角和内边距，匹配相应的 borderRadius 和 padding Token

- 📝 **模板管理系统**：支持导入/导出 Token 模板，完全兼容 Ant Design 的主题配置文件

- 🔄 **一键复制**：快速复制 Token 值，轻松粘贴到代码中


## 插件优势


- **提高设计开发效率**：不再需要手动查找颜色代码或测量边距

- **保持设计一致性**：确保使用 Ant Design 官方推荐的 Token

- **简化设计交接**：设计师可以直接提供 Token 名称而非色值

- **支持主题切换**：通过模板管理轻松在不同主题间切换
plugins.tagline: 支持选中figma的元素获取到antd主题色对应的token值

plugins.name: Figma variables helper
plugins.description:
Check the variables present in all the nodes of your document.


  1. If a property is in a state that can have a variable but doesn’t have one, it generates a warning.
  2. If a property has a variable that doesn’t exist in any of the accessible libraries, it generates an error.
